___remoteConfigSecretKeyring.description: Path to the openpgp secret keyring used to decrypt the remote configuration data (e.g. '/etc/~#PROJECT#~/configkey.gpg'); if empty a non secure connection will be used instead

___network.description: (OPTIONAL) Network type used by the Syslog

___address.description: (OPTIONAL) Network address of the Syslog daemon (ip:port) or just (:port)

___remoteConfigPath.description: Remote configuration path in which to search for the configuration file (e.g. '/config/~#PROJECT#~')
